name: GGJ 2015: Fantastic Finale
description:
Global Game Jam 2015 entry.  Original submission text below:

In Fantastic Finale, take the role of a legendary hero during his righteous stand against the evil Dark Lord Dramatos. Traverse a magical world and battle through the Batzo Hoards. Make friends and enemies along the way, and assemble a party of powerful allies to help you tackle the dangers of the world. Explore dungeons, castles, crypts and tombs as you seek to unravel the truth behind heroic destiny. Fight enemies to gain experience, and equip gear to further boost your hero's might! And most importantly, have fun on this once-in-a-lifetime adventure- because once it's over, it's over. Controls: Movement: WASD Talk: T Attack: Y

Made by John Guerra, Dillon DeSimone, and Tom Farro.
